channel.title: Dreams you've had?
channel.description:
I am known, for starting community involved topics. I shall start another one. Keep everyone going and read stuff and pass time.
Anyways, title says it all. You can list any dream you've had; scary, fun, funny, great, annoying... etc.
I'll start.
I once had this scary dream, that there was a nuclear blast that happened near my house and the sky was just dark and red, and it was the after effects of a nuclear blast as the mushroom cloud blew the wind toward me. So I rushed into my house, hoping to avoid it. (Of course, this was a dream, so it was strange), lava started slowly crawling towards me on the ground when I rushed into my basement. I sat on top of a table with my arms and leg above it, covering my self as the lava surrounded me and my window shattered. All of a sudden, the ground broke and disappeared as I was falling into a fire filled place that's wall was lava, as a deep devilish voice kept chanting "hell".
Fucking scariest thing I've had for a while. Some may find it trippy, some may not but believe me, this shit was intense. Your turn. Let the posting begin.

item.title: Dreams you've had?
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

I recently had this dream where I was planning to fix up and modify a f150 truck and give it to my mom for her birthday in october. It was February when I started. Of course, this is a dream and it was strange; my garage was bigger than usual, like 6x bigger. I was fixing up the truck with my friend and like, adding shit to it. I was trying to keep the gift a secret from my mom, but she found it. And of course, it was a dream, I couldn’t think of a lie to what it was for, so I spoiled her gift. Fuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Dreams you've had?
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:17, topic:548669”][quote author=Archer link=topic=667576.msg4464824#msg4464824 date=1419437341]

Ever since the car wreck I dream most nights of rolling the car and waking up in sweat.

Have you tried putting yourself in a deep sleep using sleeping pills etc? They used to stop me reliving (so to say) a few of my worst memories

Yeah I used robotussin and nyquil and a lot but tryin to sleep without anything so just gotta wait the PTSD out. Only three months since wreck.
[/quote]

Shit one mate, long ride ahead of you. Best of luck dealing with it.[/quote]

Thanks mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Dreams you've had?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“PI_Developer, post:14, topic:548669”]I’ve had 2 insanely strange dreams that I doubt I’ll ever forget, but for the sake of your brain, here’s one:

I was in a world where the colors were almost pastel; every color a lighter version. The bright yellow flowers on the ground and the full baby blue sky only to be interrupted by plain, white, puffy clouds. I was walking along in this mario-like world, and I wanted a snack. Apparently I enjoyed eating testicles, because next thing I know I had picked one of my nuts off (out) of my scrotum and held it up to eye-level with my index finger and thumb to my face, contemplating if I should eat it. “Oh well, it’ll grow back” POP! My testicle had for no reason at all exploded in my fingers. My face was the emotion of shock itself; eyes wide open and my jaw a centimeter from detachment. I was scared. I knew as soon as I realized that it popped that it would never grow back.[/quote]
Your writing skills are well. That story however scared me more and more as it went on.

Read full topic

item.title: Dreams you've had?
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

I’ve had 2 insanely strange dreams that I doubt I’ll ever forget, but for the sake of your brain, here’s one:

I was in a world where the colors were almost pastel; every color a lighter version. The bright yellow flowers on the ground and the full baby blue sky only to be interrupted by plain, white, puffy clouds. I was walking along in this mario-like world, and I wanted a snack. Apparently I enjoyed eating testicles, because next thing I know I had picked one of my nuts off (out) of my scrotum and held it up to eye-level with my index finger and thumb to my face, contemplating if I should eat it. “Oh well, it’ll grow back” POP! My testicle had for no reason at all exploded in my fingers. My face was the emotion of shock itself; eyes wide open and my jaw a centimeter from detachment. I was scared. I knew as soon as I realized that it popped that it would never grow back.

Read full topic
